segments.text: I notice how the woman's foot is already in the puddle of water, yet she still doesn’t react.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's puzzling how she can be so unaware of what's happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked precariously, just waiting for someone to knock them over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a wave of frustration; something is bound to go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, everything looks perfectly in order, so calm and serene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet inside, there’s this tension brewing, and I can sense it in the air.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children seem to have no idea of the chaos they are creating, but they’re fully immersed in their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR
